‡∂∏‡∑ö ‡∑Ä‡∑ô‡∂±‡∂ö‡∑ú‡∂ß Public votings open ‡∂ö‡∂ª‡∂Ω‡∑è ‡∂≠‡∑í‡∂∫‡∑ô‡∂±‡∑ä‡∂±‡∑ö. December 11 ‡∑Ä‡∑ô‡∂±‡∂ö‡∂±‡∑ä vote ‡∂ö‡∑í‡∂ª‡∑ì‡∂∏‡∑ö ‡∑Ñ‡∑ê‡∂ö‡∑í‡∂∫‡∑è‡∑Ä ‡∂¥‡∑Ä‡∂≠‡∑í‡∂±‡∑Ä‡∑è. Vote Now

The Game Awards 2025 Winners Click here.

All categories and nominees for The Game Awards 2025

Game of the Year

Recognizing a game that delivers the absolute best experience across all creative and technical fields.

  • Clair Obscur: Expedition 33
  • Hollow Knight: Silksong
  • Donkey Kong Bananza
  • Death Stranding 2: On The Beach
  • Kingdom Come Deliverance 2
  • Hades 2

Best Game Direction

Awarded for outstanding creative vision and innovation in game direction and design.

  • Hades 2
  • Split Fiction
  • Death Stranding 2: On The Beach
  • Clair Obscur: Expedition 33
  • Ghost of Yotei

Best Ongoing Game

Awarded to a game for outstanding development of ongoing content that evolves the player experience over time.

  • No Man's Sky
  • Fortnite
  • Marvel Rivals
  • Final Fantasy XIV Online
  • Helldrivers 2

Best Community Support

Recognizing a game for outstanding community support, transparency and responsiveness, inclusive of social media activity and game updates/patches.

  • Baldur's Gate 3
  • Final Fantasy XIV Online
  • No Man's Sky
  • Helldrivers 2
  • Fortnite

Best Narrative

For outstanding storytelling and narrative development in a game.

  • Death Stranding 2: On The Beach
  • Clair Obscur: Expedition 33
  • Ghost of Yotei
  • Silent Hill f
  • Kingdom Come Deliverance 2

Best Art Direction

For outstanding creative and/or technical achievement in artistic design and animation.

  • Ghost of Yotei
  • Clair Obscur: Expedition 33
  • Death Stranding 2: On The Beach
  • Hades 2
  • Hollow Knight: Silksong

Best Score/Music

For outstanding music, inclusive of score, original song and/or licensed soundtrack.

  • Hades 2
  • Clair Obscur: Expedition 33
  • Ghost of Yotei
  • Hollow Knight Silksong
  • Death Stranding 2: On The Beach

Best Audio Design

Recognizing the best in-game audio and sound design.

  • Silent Hill f
  • Ghost of Yotei
  • Battlefield 6
  • Clair Obscur: Expedition 33
  • Death Stranding 2: On The Beach

Best Performance

Awarded to an individual for voice-over acting, motion and/or performance capture.

  • Erika Ishii as Atsu ‚Äì Ghost of Yotei
  • Charlie Cox as Gustave ‚Äì Clair Obscur: Expedition 33
  • Jennifer English as Maelle ‚Äì Clair Obscur: Expedition 33
  • Troy Baker as Indiana Jones ‚Äì Indiana Jones and the Great Circle
  • Kotatsu Kato as Hinako ‚Äì Silent Hill f
  • Ben Starr as Verso ‚Äì Clair Obscur: Expedition 33

Games for Impact

For a thought-provoking game with a pro-social meaning or message.

  • Wanderstop
  • Lost Records: Bloom & Rage
  • Despelote
  • Consume Me
  • South of Midnight

Best Independent Game

For outstanding creative and technical achievement in a game made outside the traditional publisher system.

  • Clair Obscur: Expedition 33
  • Absolum
  • Blue Prince
  • Ball x Pit
  • Hollow Knight: Silksong
  • Hades 2

Best Debut Indie Game

For the best debut game created by a new independent studio.

  • Clair Obscur: Expedition 33
  • Blue Prince
  • Despelote
  • Megabonk
  • Dispatch

Best Mobile Game

For the best game playable on a mobile device.

  • Wuthering Waves
  • Persona 5 The Phantom X
  • Destiny: Rising
  • Sonic Rumble
  • Umamusume: Pretty Derby

Best VR/AR Game

For the best game experience playable in virtual or augmented reality, irrespective of platform.

  • The Midnight Walk
  • Marvel Deadpool VR
  • Alien: Rogue Invasion
  • Arken Age
  • Ghost Town

Best Action Game

For the best game in the action genre focused primarily on combat.

  • Ninja Gaiden 4
  • Hades 2
  • Shinobi: Art of Vengeance
  • Battlefield 6
  • Doom: The Dark Ages

Best Action/Adventure Game

For the best action/adventure game, combining combat with traversal and puzzle solving.

  • Ghost of Yotei
  • Hollow Knight: Silksong
  • Split Fiction
  • Indiana Jones and the Great Circle
  • Death Stranding 2: On The Beach

Best Role-Playing Game

For the best game designed with rich player character customization and progression, including massively multiplayer experiences.

  • Clair Obscur: Expedition 33
  • Monster Hunter Wilds
  • Kingdom Come Deliverance 2
  • Avowed
  • The Outer Worlds 2

Best Fighting Game

For the best game designed primarily around head-to-head combat.

  • Fatal Fury: City of the Wolves
  • Capcom Fighting Collection 2
  • 2XKO
  • Mortal Kombat: Legacy Kollection
  • Virtua Fighter 5 R.E.V.O. World Stage

Best Family Game

For the best game appropriate for family play, irrespective of genre or platform.

  • Mario Kart World
  • Donkey Kong Bananza
  • LEGO Voyagers
  • Sonic Racing: CrossWorlds
  • LEGO Party!
  • Split Fiction

Best Simulation/Strategy Game

Best game focused on real time or turn-based simulation or strategy gameplay, irrespective of platform.

  • The Alters
  • Final Fantasy Tactics: The Ivalice Chronicles
  • Civilization VII
  • Jurassic World Evolution 3
  • Tempest Rising
  • Two Point Museum

Best Sports/Racing Game

For the best traditional and non-traditional sports and racing game.

  • Mario Kart World
  • EA Sports FC 26
  • F1 25
  • Sonic Racing: CrossWorlds
  • Rematch

Best Multiplayer Game

For outstanding online multiplayer gameplay and design, including co-op and massively multiplayer experiences, irrespective of game genre or platform.

  • Elden Ring: Nightreign
  • Battlefield 6
  • PEAK
  • ARC Raiders
  • Split Fiction

Best in Accessibility

Recognizing software and/or hardware that is pushing the medium forward by adding features, technology and content to help games be played and enjoyed by an even wider audience.

  • Assassin‚Äôs Creed Shadows
  • Atomfall
  • Doom: The Dark Ages
  • EA Sports FC 26
  • South of Midnight

Best Adaptation

Recognizing outstanding creative work that faithfully and authentically adapts a video game to another entertainment medium.

  • Devil May Cry
  • Splinter Cell: Deathwatch
  • The Last of Us Season 2
  • Until Dawn
  • A Minecraft Movie

Most Anticipated Game

Recognizing an announced game that has demonstrably illustrated potential to push the gaming medium forward.

  • 007 First Light
  • Grand Theft Auto VI
  • Resident Evil: Requiem
  • The Witcher 4
  • Marvel‚Äôs Wolverine

Content Creator of the Year

For a streamer or content creator who has made an important and positive impact on the community in 2025.

  • Caedrel
  • Kai Cenat
  • MoistCritikal
  • Sakura Miko
  • The Burnt Peanut

Best eSports Game

For the game that has delivered the best overall esports experience to players (inclusive of tournaments, community support and content updates), irrespective of genre or platform.

  • Counter Strike 2
  • Dota 2
  • League of Legends
  • Mobile Legends Bang Bang
  • Valorant

Best eSports Athlete

The esports athlete judged to be the most outstanding for performance and conduct in 2025, irrespective of game.

  • Brawk
  • Chovy
  • F0rsaken
  • Kakeru
  • Menard
  • Zywoo

Best eSports Team

Recognizing a specific esports team (not the full organization) judged the most outstanding for performance and conduct in 2025.

  • Gen.G
  • NRG
  • Team Falcons
  • Team Liquid Ph
  • Team Vitality

Zen4 architecture ‡∂ë‡∂ö‡∂ß ‡∂±‡∑í‡∂ª‡∑ä‡∂∏‡∑è‡∂´‡∂∫ ‡∑Ä‡∑ô‡∂Ω‡∑è ‡∂≠‡∑í‡∂∫‡∂± Steam Machine ‡∂ë‡∂ö‡∑ö 6-core/12-thread semi-custom AMD Chip CPU ‡∂ë‡∂ö‡∂ö‡∑ä ‡∂≠‡∂∏‡∑è use ‡∂ö‡∂ª‡∂Ω‡∑è ‡∂≠‡∑í‡∂∫‡∑ô‡∂±‡∑ä‡∂±‡∑ö. 4.8GHz clock speed ‡∂ë‡∂ö‡∂ö‡∑ä ‡∑É‡∑Ñ 30W TDP ‡∂ë‡∂ö‡∂ö‡∑ä ‡∂∏‡∑ö device ‡∂ë‡∂ö‡∂ß ‡∂≠‡∑í‡∂∫‡∂±‡∑Ä‡∑è.
